Class Sock

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Sock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, ServerClient

    public class Sock
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handles socket connections
    Author:
    aschmid
